snippet: The South Street Seaport Museum struggles to get up and running again after Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: South Street Seaport Museum, one of many arts organizations in Lower Manhattan and Brooklyn damaged by Hurricane Sandy, is struggling to get up and running again; timing of disaster is especially rough for museum, which had just been rescued in 2011 by Museum of City of New York after decade of economic problems.
lead_paragraph: The South Street Seaport Museum struggles to get up and running again after Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: South Street Seaport Museum Mops Up After Hurricane Sandy
headline.main: Seaport Museum Works to Dry Out
headline.print_headline: Seaport Museum Works to Dry Out

keywords.value: Museum of the City of New York
